Articles.Content:
guys, been a while since i have played and totally don’t know how to do this.

i have a manned rocket with payload, what i would like to do is to open doors and launch the payload, put it where i want it then go back to the rocket, (switching between the two if needed)

can someone tell me how to do this? thanks a lot

11 minutes ago, crestofawave said:

guys, been a while since i have played and totally don’t know how to do this.

i have a manned rocket with payload, what i would like to do is to open doors and launch the payload, put it where i want it then go back to the rocket, (switching between the two if needed)

can someone tell me how to do this? thanks a lot

Default key bindings are [ and ] to do this.  (One cycles "forward" among all the ships within the 2.3km physics bubble, the other cycles "backwards".)
